column5: Not my video but might be worth the share.    PIKE ATTACKS!We recently had a chance to test the Lucky Bug Lures prototype Zombie Maxx 7 inch sectional bait. The following video is a brief sample of how effective it was during our latest trips to Ruffos Sportsmans Lodge and Tazin Lake Lodge 2011 Ltd.in Saskatchewan. We're really looking forward to trying a few more of the 50 variants that the company makes as the entire Zombie Maxx line has great swimming action and the pike loved them. We took 4 baits on our last trip - one was bitten off by a big pike and the other three are covered in teeth marks - the sign of a great trip made possible by a great lure!Fishing in Saskatchewan Tourism Saskatchewan Fishing Saskatchewan
Hammer handles tend to destroy everything.
Should have put hooks on the camera too, the lure was marginally better though.
Great video.  Makes me want to fish for some pike!
Exactly what I said when the video was first posted here as spam ???
